thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses Canada Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses Canada | smartbuyglasses.ca
thread.title: David

author: David
title: David
text:
I had trouble finding the style of glasses I wanted in stores. Plus I wanted to save money. Since I knew exactly what I wanted I found the Smart Buy Glasses website to be excellent. I had a question answered by support very quickly and professionally.
The price was fantastic and the glasses arrived on time (within 2 weeks). I'm very satisfied. Will definitely use them again and have recommended them to my family and friends.
